You tell Rah that you two should get on that boat. Then you can figure out what these people are up to. You push through the last of the crowd and run up to the boat bobbing in the docks. You and Rah watch carefully as the last colorfully dressed worker sets the crate they're carrying on the deck, and then follows the rest of the people and workers off to the market.

"Now's our chance," whispers Rah.

You two move up the wood connecting the boat to the docks and onto the boat's deck. You're on the deck of the boat. Hopefully nobody saw you. But maybe they heard you. Footsteps from below the deck begin getting louder and louder.

Run into the crowd Fight the approaching worker
